attributes.action: Oblige rail firms to refund regular passengers proportionally for late trains
attributes.background:
Currently Rail Operators are only obliged to pay compensation to passengers when train are delayed by more then 30 minutes and a compensation claim has been lodged and approved by them.

Consequently Rail Operators pay minimal compensation to customers whilst claiming millions from Network Rail

rejection.details: We're not sure what you mean by a proportional refund. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
